description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget named WeeklyChart, which visualizes weekly attendance data using a bar chart. It imports charting, UI, date formatting, and model/theme dependencies. The widget generates a bar chart based on weekly attendance points, displaying present and absent counts per day.

classes.name: WeeklyChart
classes.description: A Flutter widget that displays weekly attendance data as a bar chart, showcasing present and absent counts per day.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the WeeklyChart, constructing a bar chart with attendance data or showing a message if data is empty.
